statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-11) and (15,13).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{13}-{\left(-{11}\right)}}}{{{15}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{24}}{{13}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{24}}{{13}} (if it's not already reduced)
